The Thunderobot 911X offers a range of connectivity options, including three USB-A 3.1 ports and one USB-C (3.1) port, allowing you to connect various peripherals and accessories. The USB Type-C port provides additional versatility for data transfer and external display connectivity. The Thunderobot Zero Core i9 12th Gen RTX 3060 6GB Graphics 16" QHD 165Hz Gaming Laptop is a high-performance gaming laptop designed to deliver exceptional gaming experiences. Powered by an Intel Core i9-12900H processor, which has a base clock speed of 2.50 GHz that can be boosted up to 5.00 GHz, this laptop offers impressive processing power to handle demanding games and applications. With 16GB of DDR4 RAM running at 3200MHz, multitasking and running memory-intensive tasks become smoother and more efficient. The laptop features a 16-inch QHD display with a fast 165Hz refresh rate, delivering fluid and immersive visuals. The Thunderobot Zero offers a variety of ports to connect peripherals and external devices. It includes 1× USB 2.0 port, 1× USB-A 3.1 Gen 1 port, 1× USB-A 3.1 Gen 2 port, and 1× Thunderbolt 4 port, which is also compatible with DP 1.4. The inclusion of a Thunderbolt 4 port allows for high-speed data transfer and the ability to connect external displays or accessories. The Thunderobot Zero Core i9 12th Gen RTX 3060 6GB Graphics 16" QHD 165Hz Gaming Laptop is a powerful gaming machine with a high-performance processor, ample memory, fast storage, and a capable graphics card.
